abilities.name: Shadow Pounce
abilities.description: If the beast moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

abilities.name: Nightmare Howl
abilities.description: Once per long rest, the Shadowfang Beast emits a terrifying howl. Each creature within 30 feet must make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The beast makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its bite.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.
